amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $320 million from Amtrak to the Federal Aid Highway Program, reducing Amtrak's total appropriation to $580 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 25 printed in the Congressional Record to increase funding for federal aid to highways by $320 million and to offset the increase by the same amount from money for AMTRAK.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Tancredo amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 90 - 322 (Roll no. 470).
